name: The Mystery Con Dao
address: Le Thanh Nghi, khu 6, Côn Đảo, Việt Nam
description:
The Mystery Con Dao có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Côn Đảo. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như nhà hàng, dịch vụ phòng và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ, cùng với Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ. Du khách có thể thưởng thức đồ uống tại quầy bar.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại The Mystery Con Dao, mỗi phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 3 sao với bể sục.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần The Mystery Con Dao bao gồm Bãi biển An Hải, Bãi biển Lò Vôi và Bảo tàng Côn Đảo. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Côn Đảo, cách khách sạn 14 km.

review.rating: Love the decor of Mystery with greenery and the infinity rooftop pool
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Thiết kế hiện đại với rất nhiều cây, bể bơi rồi nóc nhà cũng nhiều cây rất xinh và rất nhiều góc để sống ảo. Friendly and helpful staffs. Trong phòng trang bị đầy đủ tiện nghi, toàn đồ Kohler và gốm sứ Minh Long vừa hiện đại vừa truyền thống, các sảnh chờ mỗi tầng trang trí 1 city khác nhau như Côn Đảo, Saigon, Hanoi...có 2 cái bánh hạt rất ngon đặt ở đèn bàn đầu giường để welcome khách mới tới..View trên bể bơi là núi rất côl, trèo lên nóc cũng có góc sống ảo và nhìn thấy biển nữa..Ăn sáng có bún riêu ngon, không quá nhiều món nhưng khá ngon. Mình rất thích The Mystery Côn Đảo và đã chụp đc rất nhiều hình đẹp ở đây 💙
review.comment_negative: Vị trí xa biển vì ở gần chợ Côn Đảo và Nghĩa Trang Hàng Dương, đi bộ loanh quanh tha hồ ăn uống, ngoài xe máy thì ks nên bố trí thêm xe đạp cho khách thuê cũng rất hay.

review.rating: Kỳ nghỉ thành công ngoài mong đợi. Cả nhà mình và em bé đều rất vui
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
- Nhân viên khách sạn rất nhiệt tình và dễ thương, miễn chê. Nhân viên rất để ý đến nhu cầu của khách, và nhiệt tình hỗ trợ. 
- Đồ ăn sáng rất ngon và đa dạng. Mình ở 4 ngày 3 đêm và mỗi ngày đều có món mới. Đồ ăn trưa cũng tươi ngon và giá cả phải chăng
- Phòng sạch sẽ và trang trí đẹp. Giường êm, có nhiều gối. Nhân viên làm phòng kỹ càng
review.comment_negative:
- Cách âm của khách sạn không tốt. Khách ở cùng tầng đóng/mở cửa hay nói chuyện ở hành lang là trong phòng nghe rõ hết. 
- Khách sạn không có ghế ăn và cũi dành cho em bé

The rooftop and pool is really nice, well designed and was never too busy. Nice view of the mountains.

review.rating: Nice hotel with a laid back vibe.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Very attractive hotel, with artistic decor, with a laidback tropical vibe.  Really liked the waterfall of plants draping the front of the hotel from top floor to bottom floor.  Breakfast was good and Vietnamese dishes were rotated daily for variety.  Staff were efficient and friendly.  Pool on rooftop was a welcome retreat from the heat, and we had fantastic views from the pool of surrounding mountains and ocean island views.  Lots of restaurants and coffee places just metres from hotel door.  Main attractions in Con Son town were just an easy ten to fifteen minute walk from hotel.

The pool in the evening was also nice to have a drink and chill and the staff super helpful and nice. Good location I really recommend it and will stay again there when I come back to Con Dao

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: A really beautiful hotel, with a lovely rooftop bar area. All staff were lovely and very friendly, especially ‘Nam’ who was so helpful to me and as my Vietnamese was non existent his English is amazing and I had many good conversations with him. My room was lovely, classy, roomy, comfortable and with very welcome air conditioning + a well stocked/refilled mini bar. There was one problem with my room, please see below. I should also mention the amazing Vegetarian restaurant next door.
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately I had to complain when I arrived as I did not have the room I ordered when booking with booking.com. Although it was on the 4th floor as I ordered it didn’t have the balcony and city view I ordered, in fact it was a windowless room (apart from a shower window). I’m a photographer and had imagined all the photos I would take from my balcony high above the town. The young man on reception claimed this apparently happened all the time with booking.com and that this was the room I had ordered. I was tired from travelling and at the time accepted this as couldn’t find any of my documentation to prove otherwise. However once I returned home I found my confirmation of booking email confirming that I had actually booked 4th floor with balcony and city view. Although the room I had was fantastic & the hotel too, my stay would have been even better if I had had the balcony I ordered, for my photography and for spending lazy mornings reading with a coffee. This needs to be sorted, is it a booking.com problem as suggested by the hotel and there are no rooms with balconies or was it the hotels fault, not fully honouring my booking? I feel bad criticising the hotel as otherwise they were excellent but feel I should be entitled to some compensation as I remember when booking that there were cheaper room options but I paid a bit more for the balcony.

review.comment_positive:
Very nice hotel with very friendly staff (and good English!). Situation is pretty central, far from the sea front but walking distance to many nice places. The rooftop swimming pool was small but lovely, and breakfast was good.

The room was very comfortable, lots of equipment ! We stayed 4 days and we were feeling home there.

You can rent a motorbike (very good one actually, was the best I've rent in Vietnam on 30+ rents!) to easily tour around Con Dao, which is very safe (very low traffic).

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa

review.comment_negative: Noisy at night

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: we were so impressed with our experience at this hotel from beginning to end, very good communication beforehand, prompt airport pick up. our room was immaculate, well appointed and spotless, no grim in any corners or round the shower door which is fairly common. the staff were all so friendly and helpful, breakfast covered all tastes with fresh cooked eggs to order, scooters available, and the roof top pool just perfect for a plunge at the end of the day with a great bar also on the roof.
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_negative: Dogs outside barked a lot, it made our sleeping time was not good much.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa

review.comment_negative: Everything was fantastic until the local dogs started barking.  They kept me up really late.  I understand that the dogs are part of the island culture but the hotel will have to invest in some better windows for the front rooms where we stayed in.

review.comment_negative: the window in the room was very small and the room wasn’t huge so it wasn’t a room you wanted to hang around in much.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel with fabulous staff on a quiet street in the town center. Breathtaking roof top view

The breakfast was plentiful, varied and delicious.
  Hing served us every day and she was delightful. The aesthetic of the lobby and breakfast area was perfect. I would love to meet who ever designed and decorated  this hotel.  She or he deserves many compliments.

review.rating: Comfotable base, from where out you can do the things you want to do!

review.rating: Peacful, pleasant and refreshing stay at The Mystery
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect! The staff was helpful, warm and friendly. One of them even offered us a guided street food tour free of charge (unfortunately at the end we didn’t go as we were late). The hotel itself and our room are beautiful, nicely decorated with unique taste and lovely interior design. Bed was large and superbly comfy. Our room is spacious. The swimming pool on the rooftop has a really nice and open view of the mountains. The breakfast was great. They offer motorbike rental service at a cheap price which is very convenient. I highly recommend that you stay at The Mystery for your peaceful and refreshing holiday in Con Dao!

review.rating: Can’t rate the hotel and the staff highly enough!

Beautifully styled rooms and decor throughout

review.comment_positive: the design
review.comment_negative: no communicating rooms for families

review.rating: This place was absolutely fantastic and we would highly recommend it.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Everything was pretty great, and excellent value for money. Quite luxurious overall. Breakfast was an enormous buffet with many options. Room was large, comfortable, and tastefully decorated. Outdoor shower was a plus! Lovely view from the rooftop pool/bar area. Excellent service from Ngu and the team. The hotel is in a central location which makes it easy to get around on foot, otherwise they also have scooters available for hire at very reasonable prices. Would highly recommend.
review.comment_negative: Wi-fi occasionally cut out. Occasional smell of cigarette smoke in our bathroom (possibly interconnected ventilation systems?). Otherwise absolutely no complaints.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: rooms are tastefully decorated, clean, and the linen is comfortable. hotel is well located and an easy walk to the market and many restaurants if you decide not to drive.
review.comment_negative: the superior king rooms look into each other, which is super odd. you can see the other person lying down in bed, using the bathroom if the door is open, etc. etc. if you want any privacy at all, you'll have to keep the curtains drawn the entire time - or upgrade to one of the better rooms. the bathrooms are lovely but the hot/cold taps for the shower are an absolute nightmare to navigate - probably fine if you don't mind cold (or boiling) showers. breakfast ends very strictly at 9am - probably also fine if you're an early riser.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Loved the style of the design/style of the hotel, it was super clean and had a great rooftop pool. Staff were friendly, and informative. Location was good - in the centre of the 'town' so near lots of restaurants and bars, but a walk/ride to the beach. Breakfast was also great and had a lot of options.
review.comment_negative: Minor thing, but a good thing to note - I stayed in the cheapest type of room - no balcony, everything about the room was great except the building had like a 'U design' in the middle which meant my window looked directly into the window of another room a metre away which was a little weird, so if I was resting on my bed or getting changed, I had to close the curtain and loose natural light,  or risk looking over and seeing a stranger in their bed.  Next time I would book a balcony room as balcony rooms didn't have this design issue.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Can't speak highly enough about The Mystery. The room was great, the bathroom was well appointed and stylish, the shared areas were clean and stylish, the breakfast buffet was great with VN and western options, and the staff was nice and helpful. The motorbike rental was simple and provided good motorbikes.
review.comment_negative: That I couldn't stay longer.

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: If I could have rated this property 9.5 I would have. Mystery is very good value for money. Great breakfast choices, fabulous helpful staff, many English fluent, well appointed rooms, great rooftop pool, views over Con Dao. Comfortable beds that you can get lost in. Things have changed in Con Dao in the last 5 years and it is now not a really cheap place to visit. It is still reasonable and this hotel is good value for money. There are many seafood restaurants within walking distance. We can recommend the small family restaurant on the corner 30 metres from Mystery. GREAT home made noodles and reasonable prices. The only drawback is the ten minute walk to the beach and that's why it gets a 9.5 and not a 10. Thank you Mystery and your wonderful staff, we hope to be back in December.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: The property is a cool design, the rooftop pool was great. The view of mountains is cool. All of staff were very friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was good and changed daily.
review.comment_negative:
The location was further away from things than we thought. 

It was not as clean as we liked, lipstick on cups and old food under tv table.. also we had to ask cleaners for towels/toilet paper when not replaced 2/6 days. 

Unfortunately the noise in the room was bad - as other reviews say. Constant barking neighbourhood dogs all night and loud noises on the street at all hours kept us up. Windows

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: Room was lovely and as advertised. The rooftop pool is more of a plunge pool, nice to chill out and enjoy the views. Breakfast was all right nothing special.
review.comment_negative:
Night staff were difficult on check out. We checked out at 5:20am as we had an early flight to catch. We had arranged airport transport with the day staff the night before which worked out well. After checking our room (which we found to be unusual given that it's not a budget hotel) the staff member pulled out a piece of blank paper and wrote down a charge of 100,000 dong with no explanation as to what for. When we questioned him about this he tried using Google translate to explain as his English was non existent. Google kept mistranslating and eventually he managed to tell us it was a charge for using the sauna, which neither of us used. Obviously he couldn't understand what we were saying when we tried to explain we did not use the sauna only the roof top pool. The issue was dropped 5 minutes later and we were brought outside to get a taxi. 

Just to note also we received a proper invoice when we checked in and paid for our room. This charge was not printed on an invoice, leading us to believe he was trying to scam us on check out. This may not be the case and it might be a genuine mistake on the part of the hotel but it certainly left a bitter taste in our mouths. 

We also feel we might have been overcharged for the taxi to the airport. 

We stayed in other accomodations on con dao and customer service was much better else where.

review.rating: Great place and staff but... really noisy during our stay
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: Really nice hotel, with modern decoration. Comfy room with spacious bathtub. Staff was nice and helped us rent out a motorbike. Breakfast was good as well.
review.comment_negative: Despite the place and staff being great, the noise ended up ruining our 2 nights there. The room we had was not sound proof and the neighbors (house next to the hotel) were extremely noisy (loud discussions until 3am, karaoke, etc...). Even with all windows closed, it felt like they were right in the room with us. What was supposed to be a relaxing holiday didn't turn out the way we wanted to.

review.rating: Nice but expected more for price and marketing of hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Comfort and cleanliness cannot be faulted. Decor is gorgeous. I think I had the smallest cheapest kind of double and it was ample room for a couple.
review.comment_negative:
Very few staff. I did visit during Tet so I HOPE that's why. As soon as one staff member is occupied you are just left waiting often with no acknowledgement. We had to wait near 10mins on arriving to be greeted - I was literally shouting down through a door marked "staff" to zero response.  

Renting a bike situation is annoying. Great it is so readily available but pricey if you aren't sure what your plans are and you don't want to book out a full block of days but maybe see what each day brings. You might have to get a different bike each day and pay for new petrol on top of the daily rental cost per day. Simply money grabbing. Better system required.

Then just little things that you'd hope would be available in a hotel of this calibre/cost: a toilet in/near the lobby and breakfast area, an iron and iron board available for guests to borrow and use, turning off the beach club vibe music on the rooftop (the rooftop isn't big enough to warrant that level), better equipped bar - I had messaged before booking to check they served both wine and beer, which I was assured they did but on asking for wine the member of staff said no and then panicked and literally found a bottle of wine before attempting to charge me 200k a glass.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
1. Location is right next to the center. Close to most of tourist attractions.
2. Reasonable motorbike rental fee.
3. Early C/I.
4. Fast WiFi connection.
5. Comfortable bed.
6. Sustainability program & protecting the environment program.
7. Reasonable food & beverages prices.
8. Staffs tried their best to please every guests.
9. Smart TV. Can play Youtube, Netflix and Spotify.
10. Good aroma.
review.comment_negative:
1. No Booking.com Genius Member recognition.
2. No recognition for special occasion. No extra mile thoughtful counts for guests.
3. Cannot borrow iron and iron board. Only accept Laundry Services at extra cost.
4. No soundproof. Can hear noise from other rooms.
5. Room view not nice. (Stay in 3rd floor). You can see other guests from their rooms through their room's window.
6. Swimming pool tiles uneven. Diving is not advisable. Color of tiles match with the color of water. There's safety and security issue.
7. Guests should not be allowed to smoke at the pool and even at the pool side.
8. Should not use glass at the swimming pool. Safety and security purposes.
9. Night staffs should still wear decent uniforms while on duty.
10. More food varieties for breakfast. Consider to add some more local dishes or specialty dishes in Con Dao.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Nicely decorated new hotel with great location in the center  . Rooms were spacious , clean and stylish . Bed was comfy and stuff really nice and helpful . We rented  bikes for 3 days from them and they helped to recommend restaurants around when their kitchen was closed . Pool on the roof is refreshing with nice views and sunset.
Only breakfast buffet is something what will hopefully improve in the future . Not much variety of food and soon empty. We were group of friends vegetarians and vegans and we didn't have many options even we requested it after arrival   ,mostly meat or seafood in all dishes .  Alternative milk as soya milk, more cereals and more vegetable dishes would be great . Despite of this I recommend this hotel for its location ,beauty and helpful friendly stuff.
review.comment_negative: We were group of friends vegetarians and vegans and we didn't have many options for breakfast even we requested it after arrival   ,mostly meat or seafood in all dishes .  Alternative milk as soya milk or almond milk, more cereals and more vegetable dishes would be great .

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_negative: the sound proofing in the rooms was not good! could hear the neighbors whisper thrue the doors. :/

review.comment_negative: Staff rarely smile and feels they don’t want to be there. One girl on the staff was better than the rest but not sure of her name. Rooms are not soundproof. You will hear lots of noise from outside. WiFi very weak. Breakfast average at best. Pillows very cheap and not good. Elevator takes an incredibly long time to come

review.rating: A great place to stay, we enjoyed the small pool but would have liked a bit more shade.

review.comment_positive:
The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. 
the rooms were nice, light and modern.
review.comment_negative: The rooms were very clean when we arrived but we’re not cleaned thoroughly after that and my daughter found ants in her room because of that.

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:

review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Hôtel à taille humaine très joliment décoré et soigné. Le personnel est très agréable et toujours prêt à vous aider. La piscine en rooftop avec sa terrasse est parfaite. Il y avait peu de monde et nous avons pu profiter de l'endroit rien que pour nous toute une après-midi. L'emplacement est idéal et près de tout. La location de scooter avec l'hôtel à moins de 5euros la journée nous a beaucoup aidé. Le restaurant Madame Ha qui se trouve à côté est vraiment bon et les produits de qualité. Bref, c'est vraiment pour moi un hôtel idéal pour séjourner quelques jours sur l'île de Con Dao !
review.comment_negative: Il manquait une ampoule dans la lampe de chevet et il manquait d'eau chaude...

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Chambre spacieuse, propre. Literie très confortable.
Location de scooter en dessous des plusieurs autres lieux en ville.
review.comment_negative: L’insonorisation n’est pas la meilleure mais ça va car l’hôtel n’est pas en plein cœur de la ville.

review.rating: Le must sur une île paradisiaque
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King

On a adoré la situation de l hôtel, proche de tous commerces,  restaurants, plages, port...
Le super petit déjeuner 
Le.personnel adorable et bienveillant 
L'organisation des excursions si on le.souhaite
Bref vous l'aurez compris c'est ici qu'il faut venir
review.comment_negative: Peu de gens parlent anglais

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Le rooftop avec la piscine et vue sur les montagnes. Parfait !!!

review.rating: プールサイドでリラックスした極上の時間が楽しめるブティックホテル
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: 最上階のフロアには小さいけれどプールとプールサイドバーがあり、リラックスしてゆっくりと時間を過ごすことができました。夕刻にはプールから山に沈むきれいな夕日も見られます。有料でスチームサウナがあるので、私はプールの後に予約を入れておいて、スムーズに楽しめました。サウナ後には、プールサイドバーでビールを飲みながら、星空を眺められました。なかなか贅沢な楽しみ方ができたと思います。The Mystery Con Daoは2回目の滞在ですが、前回は1泊だったので、今回は2泊して更にホテルでの滞在が楽しめたと思います。また、近くにはスーパーマーケットもあって便利。朝食も美味しい。フライトの関係で朝早いチェックアウトにも拘らず、朝食バイキングも(準備できたものに限って)利用させていただきました。感謝です。スタッフもいろいろ親切に対応してくれました。
review.comment_negative: 私が泊まった部屋は窓が小さく、ほとんど外が見られず残念。前回泊まった部屋は、窓はなかったものの、張り出したスペースがあり、洗濯した水着などを干すスペースもあって便利だったのに、今回はありませんでした。バスルームも前回の時の部屋のほうがゆったりしていた感じ。ちょっと残念でした。お洒落なのは良いところなのですが、もう少し実用的なスペースも欲しかったな…と個人的には思いました。それから、ホテルの外観…前回は緑に覆われていて、本当にミステリアスな感じで気に入っていたのに、今回はテトのせいか、赤い飾り付けが目立って、更にホテルの外側の緑の観葉植物も減っていたようで、私のお気に入りのイメージではなかったことが何より残念でした。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Sehr modernes, stilvoll eingerichtetes Hotel. Umfassendes Frühstücks Buffet mit frischem Obst, Gemüse, asiatischen Speisen, Gebäck, frischen Ei Gerichten und Pho.
Sehr bemühtes Personal das zwar nicht immer Englisch spricht, sich aber mit Google Translate weiterhilft. In meinem ersten Zimmer war es zu laut, auf Grund eines Generators in der Nähe der Not-Stiege. Ich konnte das Zimmer problemlos wechseln. Über das Hotel können problemlos Mopeds gemietet werden, mit denen man die Insel erkunden kann. 
Neben dem Hotel gibt es ein sehr gutes Restaurant, Madame Ha's Restaurant, die Besitzerin spricht gutes Englisch und hat gute Tipps was man auf der Insel besichtigen kann.
review.comment_negative: Der Pool Bereich auf der Dachterrasse war etwas spartanisch. Der Infinity Pool ist sehr klein und eignet sich zum Abkühlen. Das Leinendach der Sonnenliege ist nicht UV beständig, wenn man sich nicht mit Sonnencreme einschmiert und sich in dessen Schatten legt, kriegt man auch einen Sonnenbrand.

review.rating: Goede kamer met lekker ontbijt. Ideaal om Con Dao te verkennen met scooter
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Locatie: ideaal. Op loopafstand van het centrum, nabij de markt, eetgelegenheden ( op de hoek een lekker noodle-restaurant). We hebben geen gebruik gemaakt van het zwembad noch rooftopbar ( de bar was nogal duur)
review.comment_negative: De rooftopbar te duur.

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Utmärkt frukost, Trivsam pool och solstolar på taket. Nära till nattmarknaden.

review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive:
Hôtel situé à Con Son, la seule ville de l’île. Bel hôtel, surtout en chambre de luxe avec grand balcon.
Lit confortable, chambre spacieuse. Pour le petit déjeuner, il y a de tout même de délicieux choux à la crème.
Nous avons loué un scooter auprès de l’hôtel 900.000 dôngs pour 6 jours.
Le restaurant végétarien de MMe Ha est très bon, et je vous recommande le restaurant Han Oi avec son smoothie tropical.
Plage de l’aéroport superbe avec le restau plage et son riz aux crevettes-calamars un délice.
Île très ventée en janvier avec des rafales à 50/60km/h , accrochez-vous 😅 au 🛵 . Trop ventée pour faire de la plongée ou snorkeling.
Bonne découverte
review.comment_negative:
C’est un très joli hôtel et de taille humaine.
Une lampe de chevet plus éclairante et il en faudrait une autre.
Dans le bassin à l’étage, il y a une petite contremarche qui n’est pas bien visible quand on est dans l’eau.
Shower cap pour les douches (juste un détail)

review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: Pool, Lage, hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter*innnen, schönes Zimmer, bequeme Betten, einfache und unkomplizierte Roller-Vermietung und gutes Frühstück
review.comment_negative: Hellhörige Zimmer (laute Musik und lauter Hund "Nachbars Lumpi" hat ständig gebellt) - dadurch kein guter Schlaf, die Handtücher am Pool könnten ausgetauscht werden (haben ihre besten Zeiten hinter sich)

review.rating: Gerne wieder, zu empfehlen für ruhigen und entspannten Urlaub
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: Geräumiges, gemütliches Zimmer, geschmackvolle Einrichtung, entspannte und ruhige Atmosphäre, schöner Rooftop, zuvorkommendes Personal

review.rating: Séjour reposant sur une île calme.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Hôtel décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Beaux équipements fonctionnant bien. Bois omniprésent, beaux meubles, personnel charmant mais ne parlant pas toujours anglais à l'accueil.
review.comment_negative: Pas de vélo ni de scooter à louer, c'est dommage.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Exzellentes Hotel mit tollem Design und tadellosem Personal. Letztes Jahr gab es dort noch keinen Kaffee zum Frühstück, das hat sich jetzt geändert. Auch mit Kreditkarte kann man inzwischen problemlos zahlen. Umfangreiches Buffet! Super fanden wir, daß es einen Frühstücksbereich gibt, der nicht klimatisiert ist. Auch das Personal hat uns gut gefallen. Als sich z.B. ein Gast eine Zigarette anzünden wollte, ist das Personal sofort eingeschritten.
review.comment_negative: Kleine Kinder bekommen leider immer noch nicht Kinderstühle zur Verfügung. Der Pool ist nicht zum Schwimmen geeignet, aber für die meisten ist er sowieso nur Fotohintergrund.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Habitacion muy amplia con un pequeño balcón, amabilidad por parte del personal, siempre a disposición e incluso una vez hecho el check out nos dejaron seguir disfrutando de la piscina
review.comment_negative: Nada

review.rating: Excellente adresse , dans une rue au calme dans la ville.  Décoration raffinée et roof top sympa . confort et qualité de
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Excellente adresse : belle décoration raffinée . Roof top très agréable . Confort et qualité des équipements , personnel au top de l’accueil. Situé dans une rue au calme, en ville.

review.rating: Tolle Lage und leckeres Frühstück, sehr zu empfehlen
review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
Sehr nette und zuvorkommende Mitarbeiter.
Die Lage ist super, es ist ruhig aber man ist innerhalb weniger Minuten im Zentrum oder am Strand.
Sehr leckeres und abwechslungsreiches Frühstück. Die Speisen wechseln jeden Tag, so dass es nicht langweilig wird.
Einen Roller zu mieten war total unkompliziert und hat 2 Minuten gedauert. Sehr günstig mit 6€ am Tag inklusive Benzin.
Insgesamt wirkt alles sehr hochwertig, tolle Atmosphäre schon in der Lobby.
Der Infinity-Pool war klein aber fein.
review.comment_negative:
Der Balkon war sehr klein und ungemütlich, zu zweit konnte man hier unmöglich sitzen.
Der Kühlschrank war nur Vormittags an, abends Getränke zu kühlen ging also nicht.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Si volviese a Con Dao, me volvería a alojar en este hotel sin duda. La limpieza, la habitación increíble, la ducha, el desayuno, el personal. Todo perfecto.
review.comment_negative: Nada. Todo genial.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Exzellenter Service, das Personal war stets bemüht, alle Wünsche zu erfüllen (und Sprachbarrieren zu überwinden ;))
Die Zimmer sind modern und gemütlich eingerichtet. Besonderes Highlight ist die Rooftop-Bar mit dem Pool.
review.comment_negative: Es gab eine Baustelle nebenan, von der einiger Lärm ausging. Dies wird allerdings nur ein temporäres Problem sein.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Die zusätzliche Außendusche war klasse. Die Dachterasse mit zugegebenermaßen Maßen flachen Pool. Hilfsbereites Personal, die nicht andauernd Tours verkaufen wollten, aber auf Nachfrage welche anboten. Eine Rollervermietung war ebenfalls vorhanden.
review.comment_negative: Das Frühstück war sehr überschaubar. Der Boden im Zimmer wurde gefühlt immer sandiger, wahrscheinlich wurde nicht gekehrt/gewischt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Très bel hôtel. Très bien entretenu. Très beau design.

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait!  Notre chambre,  le personnel,  la piscine et bar sur le toit,  la facilité à avoir un scooter.   C'etait un bonheur!
review.comment_negative: RAS

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Hotel molto bello, pulito e dotato di ogni confort. Ottime soluzioni di prodotti ecosostenibili. Buona la posizione a poca distanza dalla spiaggia.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Bon rapport qualité prix. Personnel agréable. Chambre un peu petite malgré tout. Très beau hall d’accueil avec une déco très mélangeant bien le moderne et le traditionnel. Bon petit déjeuner, sauf le café. Pas d’expresso. Un peu excentré si vous n’avez pas de moyen de transport. La rue de l’hôtel est très sympa avé un resto végétarien parfait et un café excellent. L’hôtel propose des locations de mobylette. Le service pressing reste bon marché mais un peu au dessus des standards vietnamiens. Télé parfaite avec accès direct Netflix et Amazon prime. Bon séjour dans l’ensemble.
review.comment_negative: Chambre difficile à aérer.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: L’accoglienza, la disponibilità del personale, la colazione, l’ambiente.
review.comment_negative: Nulla

review.rating: Très bon séjour, bon emplacement, belle île.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Très bel hôtel, le personnel très agréable et très prévenant.
Bon petit déjeuner
review.comment_negative: La jeune femme de l'accueil 🤔 pas très accueillante.

review.rating: Très beau et personnel particulièrement serviable
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Super séjour dans cette hôtel pour beaucoup de raisons : 
Espaces communs et chambre très jolies. Magnifique vue depuis la piscine. 
Nous avons adoré le petit déjeuner. 
Et surtout, le personnel était particulièrement serviable, merci d’avoir rendu ce séjour si agréable
Si nous revenons à Con Dao ce sera dans cet hôtel
review.comment_negative: Contrairement aux indications sur booking les chambres classiques ne disposent pas de vues, sauf depuis la salle de bain

review.rating: とにかくお洒落で雰囲気の良いブティックホテル！！
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: 部屋の中がとにかくお洒落で素敵！インテリアなどもセンスが良く、居心地が良い。ホテルのロビーや施設内も清潔で快適。色調なども目に心地良い。部屋にはもちろん、ロビーやフロアにもたくさんの絵が飾られていてきれい。小さなブティックホテルながら、最上階(5階)には、プールもある。小さいプールではあるが、清潔で、ここからの眺望も良い。プールサイドにバーもある。また、同じ階に有料でスチームバスがあるので、20分くらい前に予約すれば使用できる。朝食のバイキングも美味しい。街中に立地しており、どこに行くのにも便利。1泊だけではもったいなかった感じ。2、3泊できると良かったかも。ホテルスタッフも親切。ホテルの名前(The Mystery)も興味深い！
review.comment_negative: ロケーションが便利なので、宿泊客が外出して飲食することが多いとの理由で、ホテルのレストランがディナータイムは営業してなかったり、プールサイドのバーも夜9時に終了とちょっと早いのが残念。贅沢を言えば、スチームバスに加えて、普通のサウナもあればもっと嬉しい。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Moderne und schöne Einrichtung, toller Rooftoppool, super Lage.
review.comment_negative: Zimmerservice wurde nicht immer gemacht, Laundryservice überteuert.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: Просторный номера, стильный отель, чистота, наличие напитков и закусок в баре в номере.
review.comment_negative: Довольно шумно в номерах, плохая шумоизоляция, очень слышно улицу, под окнами находятся кафе и ведутся разные работы в соседних домах.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Sehr schönes kleines Hotel wenige Gehminuten vom Markt. Günstige Moped-Vermietung im Haus, sehr hilfreich wenn man auch mal die Insel erkunden will. Saubere große Zimmer mit Balkon, so kann man auch abends noch in Ruhe ein Glas Wein trinken. Ausstattung lässt keine Wünsche offen. Frühstücksbuffet umfangreich, tägliche wechselnde Warmgerichte, verschiedene Süßspeisen, Obst, Toast ... ließ keine Wünsche offen. Abends durch die zentrale Lage idealer Startpunkt zum Erkunden der Meeresfrüchte in den lokalen Restaurants ...
review.comment_negative: Der Start war etwas holprig, wir kamen durch ein Problem mit dem Flug nicht abends, sondern erst am nächsten Morgen. Trotzdem wir abends schon eine SMS vom Hotel bekamen, dass unser Zimmer fertig sei, mussten wir am nächsten Tag nochmal länger warten, bis wir ins Zimmer durften ... was nicht wirklich nachvollziehbar war (Jammern auf sehr hohem Niveau ...)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
großartige Architektur und Einrichtung mit Liebe zum Detail. 

hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter*innen. 

schöne Dachterrasse inklusive Infinity Pool.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Personal war sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich, Einrichtung war modern, Design des Hotels war super, Infinity Pool mit Blick über die Stadt war klasse, alles sauber, Frühstück inbegriffen und große Auswahl, wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt. Scooter konnte über Hotel für einen fairen Preis gemietet werden. Lage ist gut, nebenan sind 2 sympathische Restaurants/Cafe. Tut mir Leid, dass ich kein Trinkgeld am Ende gegeben habe. Ich war mit meinem Kopf schon am Flughafen. 
Das Hotel ist eine absolute Empfehlung.
review.comment_negative: Am Morgen hört man die Hähne kreischen. Da kann man nichts gegen machen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement central, la gentillesse du personnel, le petit déjeuner (le meilleur de notre trip au Vietnam). N'hésitez pas à essayer le restaurant "Madame Ha" à côté également
review.comment_negative: L'insonorisation des chambres avec balcon vers la rue

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: l'. hotel e una garanzia. ci siamo gia stati in precedenza. Il personale e efficace, attento ad ogni richiesta. Viene inoltre offerto un servizio di nolo motociclette che sull'isola risulta fondamentale. La colazione e eccezionale.
review.comment_negative: Come in passato abbiamo purtroppo trovato ospiti molto rumorosi. Noi abbiamo soggiornato al 4 piano e tutta la notte nella camera di fronte alla nostra si e fatto chiasso a lungo. Servirebbe piu attenzione su questo aspetto

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Un hôte moderne, très propre, très bien équipé, un personnel aimable. Le petit-déjeuner est correct, buffet varié avec fruits, produits et plats vietnamiens. Location de motorbike pour 150 000 dongs à la journée. La plage est à 10 mn à  pied. Ne pas manquer, juste à côté le restaurant Gia Minh Bistro, qui ne paie pas de mine, mais où il y a un vrai "chef", sans doute un des meilleurs de Con Son.
review.comment_negative: Comme partout, le bruit est omniprésent dehors, mais c’est le Vietnam....

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
ホテルのロビーに入るとアロマの良い香りに包まれます。内装にこだわりを感じさせるお洒落なブティックホテルといった感じです。
スタッフの対応も雑談を交えながらフレンドリーです。
中心部では一番良いホテルかも知れません。
また泊まりたいです。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Très bon rapport qualité prix. Hôtel récent, très bien décoré et petit déjeuner très bien.
review.comment_negative: Les aboiements des chiens du quartier la nuit

Le rooftop et le petit espace piscine

review.comment_negative:
Bruyant la nuit (autres occupants)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Sehr schönes Design, das Personal, insbesondere Nam, war besonders freundlich

review.rating: super hôtel et les employé sont très professionnel
review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: tout
review.comment_negative: la vue

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Tout était parfait ! Un très bel accueil, un personnel charmant et aidant, une chambre spacieuse, bien équipée et décorée, un lit... comme un nuage !
Petit déjeuner varié, agréable espace piscine avec vue magnifique, le tout pour un super rapport qualité/prix. Notre meilleur hôtel de tout notre séjour au Viêt Nam !

review.rating: Väga armas, rahulik ja hea asukohaga hotell. Sisustus väga maitsekas, katuseterrassil mõnus bassein.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Hommikusöök oli väga mitmekülgne ja suurepärane. Teenindus väga hea. Administraator Nam oli alati abivalmis ja vastutulelik.
review.comment_negative: Sattusime toavahetuse käigus mitte suitsetajatena tuppa, kus olid eelnevalt suitsetajad ööbinud.

review.rating: Sehr entspannter Aufenthalt in Zimmer mit tollem Design.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Sehr hilfsbereites Personal!
review.comment_negative: Beim Frühstück wären Schilder mit den Namen des Essens gut gewesen. Ggf. mehr vegetarische Optionen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel ist sehr neu.
Die Ausstattung hübsch und modern.
Es ist sehr sauber und das Personal sehr bemüht.
review.comment_negative: Einige Zimmer haben Fenster, die direkt in andere Zimmer blicken. Das heißt man hat eigentlich immer die Vorhänge geschlossen.

review.rating: Toller Aufenthalt mit bester Betreuung durch das Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war außergewöhnlich hilfsbereit und freundlich, auf alle unsere Wünsche wurde eingegangen. Für uns wurde beim Frühstück ein extra vegetarisches Gericht zubereitet, da das Buffet nur omnivore warme Speisen enthält. Es stehen jedoch auch immer frische Früchte, Brot und Marmelade zur Verfügung. Das Frühstück war generell ausgezeichnet. Das Zimmer wurde täglich gereinigt, Handtücher wurden getauscht. Bei der Organisation von Trips zum Schnorcheln und Wandern im Nationalpark wurden wir vom Rezeptionisten direkt mit den Guides in Verbindung gesetzt. Motorbikes konnten direkt beim Hotel ausgeliehen werden. Direkt nebenan befinden sich zwei tolle Restaurants. Zu Fuß ist das gesamte Stadtzentrum und der Markt erreichbar.
review.comment_negative: Unter dem Bett und in den Ecken im Zimmer könnte es sauberer sein. Das ist Jammern auf hohem Niveau. Ansonsten alles bestens.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: L’hôtel est très propre, bien équipé et le personnel est au petit soin. Parfaitement situé sur la belle île de Con Dao. Le petit déjeuner est excellent. Je recommande! Super rapport qualité / prix !
review.comment_negative: Rien!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
位置很方便，步行可以抵達市區各景點
員工外語能力OK，服務非常貼心

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi

review.rating: très bon séjour dans un hôtel cosy
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: la gentillesse du personnel
review.comment_negative: rien

review.rating: Mycket fint hotell som är en bra utgångspunkt om man hyr moped.
review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: Bra frukost med mycket att välja på. Färska frukter, omelett, äggröra, yoghurt, bröd, juice, kaffe mm. Mycket fint hotell. Bästa stranden ligger till vänster om flygplatsen. Mitt i naturreservatet.
review.comment_negative: Ljudnivån på nätterna, ta med öronproppar. Hundar som skäller nätterna igenom och mopeder mm. Hotellet ligger en bit från ständerna men moppe är bra att hyra för att upptäcka ön.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Design
review.comment_negative: Separerei la reception dalla zona colazione

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: super ontvang, nette en voldoende ruime kamers met een lekker ontbijt. zeer behulpzaam personeel.
review.comment_negative: om toch iets te zeggen, rooftop zwembad is enkel goed als afkoeling en de rooftop bar zit snel vol in geval van regen

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: het dakterras met zwembad en de inrichting

review.rating: Heerlijk verblijf voor een prima prijs!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Mooie kamers en comfortabele bedden! Alles is strak afgewerkt en schoon. Alle faciliteiten werken prima en vriendelijk personeel die je overal bij wilt helpen. Daarnaast mooi uitzicht vanaf het zwembad/bar. Locatie is centraal en met de scooter ben je overal zo.
review.comment_negative: Eigenlijk geen minpunten. Het is jammer dat je niet echt kunt zwemmen in het zwembad en het meeste personeel spreekt bijna geen Engels, maar met Google translate kom je een heel eind!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: super Frühstück-tolle Zimmer

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Das Personal ist uns stets mit einem Lächeln begegnet und war sehr hilfsbereit. Das Hotel warsuper augestattet und komfortabel.
review.comment_negative: Die Lüftung auf der Toilette hat manchmal Zigarettenqualm von irgendwoher ins Bad hoch gezogen.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive:
-les chambres sont très belles, modernes, propres, décorées avec goût. Literie confortable. 
-Bon emplacement, possibilité de louer un scooter pour pas cher. 
-bon petit déjeuner, chouette piscine sur le toit. 
-Incroyable gentillesse du personnel.
review.comment_negative: L’isolation sonore pourrait être améliorée.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und in guter Lage.
Auch das Personal ist außergewöhnlich freundlich und aufmerksam: Wir hatten bei einer lokalen Bank ein Problem mit dem Geldautomaten und der hilfsbereite Rezeptionist hat sofort angeboten sich bei der Bank zu erkundigen und uns geholfen.
Auf jeden Fall sehr empfehlenswertes Hotel!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: limpio, personal muy amable y atento, nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos. Buenos servicios

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Très bel hôtel neuf avec décoration soignée. Le rooftop est magnifique avec une vue sur les montagnes et la mer. Le personnel est très agréable et professionnel.
review.comment_negative: Le prix de la chambre à la période où nous sommes allés était élevé.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Personnel très agréable, toujours prêt à rendre service. Chambre confortable et spacieuse.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Très propre, très confortable. Très bon buffet petit-déjeuner. Possibilité de louer un scooter pas trop cher.
review.comment_negative: Bruit sur les travaux environnants

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Très bel hôtel avec des chambres spacieuses et petit balcon. Piscine sympa sur le toit. Bon petit déjeuner. Location de scooter possible et personnel très serviable. Hôtel à recommander.
review.comment_negative: Rie en fait sauf l absence de cocktails au bar de la piscine

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Frühstück wahr für den Preis bestens,Das Personal top leider wenig englisch Kenntnisse  ,gute Lage Markt sowie Restaurants  in unmittelbarer Nähe zu empfehlen GIA MINH ca 15m vom Hotel dazu korrekte Taxifahrer für Asien einmalig superschöne Trails und Strände die leider(Strände) zugemüllt sind,der Ort selber ist sauber
review.comment_negative: Ein brauchbare Karte von Con Dao währe nicht schlecht

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: 早餐豐富，旅店轉角那間bistro 一定要去試試，非常好吃😋！旅店有提供機車出租，很方便

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Bien situé sur l'île de Con Dao. Les installations sont neuves et avec une vrai touche de décoration. Tous les meubles sont de qualité. L'agencement est très joli. Lits confortables. Possibilité de louer des scooters à la journée pour 150.000 dongs. Bon petit déjeuner.
review.comment_negative: Un peu bruyant malheureusement dû à des travaux dans l'immeuble d'en face. Beaucoup de vis à vis dans les chambres, qui donnent sur les chambres d'hôtels (1 mètre de distance). Donc peu de lumière et beaucoup de paires de yeux.

review.rating: svago e ricerca di luoghi di interesse
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe với Bồn tắm Spa
review.comment_positive: le dimensioni della camera e la collocazione della vasca da bagno sul balcone che contribuisce ad accendere ancora di più il romanticismo della struttura

review.rating: Very nice hotel. It's rather a 4 starr hotel! I recommended others to stay here.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Erg mooie architectuur. Vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel. Mooie kamer, goede douche, comfortabele bedden en lekker en gezond ontbijt. 

Het hotel heeft een erg aangename sfeer.
review.comment_negative:
Het zwembad. Dat is niet geschikt om te zwemmen. Het is eerder een jacuzzi. 

Het zou fijn zijn als het hotel ook diner aanbiedt. De restaurants op het eiland zijn niet fantastisch. Daarin zou het hotel de gasten nog beter in kunnen bedienen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
La recepcionista que había estas noches y al marcharnos por la mañana es encantadora. Nos ha ayudado a buscar plan alternativo para estos días al estar cerrado el puerto y no poder bucear como te íbamos previsto. Incluso nos recomendó varios sitios donde comer o alquilar bicis. Las habitaciones están tienen una decoración muy chula, el baño moderno con un toque asiático también nos gustó. Te dejan todos los días un litro de agua en botella de cristal y hay batas y chanclas para utilizar por aquí.
En la 5a planta tiene una terraza con piscina y cafetería con vistas a la montaña.
review.comment_negative: Llegamos al hotel a las 12 y el check in no comenzaba hasta las 2 pm. Habíamos escrito pidiendo que se nos diera antes la habitación porque estaba lloviendo de forma torrencial y llegábamos calados. No fue así y se nos informó con bastante sequedad de qué el check in no sería posible hasta las 2. Estábamos dentro del horario de las comidas y fuera llovía a cántaros, así que pensamos en aprovechar y comer, pero tampoco fue posible porque la cocina estaba ocupada haciendo las tareas de la casa (literalmente fue lo que nos escribió el camarero en su movil porque no hablaba nada de inglés). Así que cogimos chubasquero y paraguas y nos fuimos a mojarnos pero a comer hasta que llegara la hora del check in.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
- die Einrichtung, mit viel Stil
- Sauberkeit
- Lage des Hotels
- sehr, sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal
- Wäsche-Service
- Frühstück (Buffet)
- Vermittlung Motorradmiete
review.comment_negative: Absolut nichts!

review.room_type: Suite Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Nie ma rzeczy, która by mi się nie podobała. Polecam, jakość super
review.comment_negative: Nie ma

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Wunderschönes Hotel, großes Lob an die Architekten. Uns hat es sehr gut gefallen, wir mögen diesen Stil Urlaub zu machen und kommen gern wieder. Ganz großartig die Dachetage mit dem Pool. 
Leider gibt es Probleme auf der Ebene des Managements. (Erstens) Wir hatten eine Abholung von der Fähre vereinbart und bezahlt. Das hatten wir uns persönlicher vorgestellt, wir mussten erst lange suchen und fragen und fanden dann einen gewöhnlichen engen Bus, der nach langem Warten zum Hotel abfuhr. Nie wieder! (Zweitens) Wir hatten bei Booking.com unsere Kreditkartennummer hinterlegt, aber das Hotel war nicht bereit, sie zu belasten. Wir mussten vorab zur Bank, um umständlich eine Anzahlung zu überweisen. Beim Einchecken wollten sie die Restzahlung in bar, aber die ATM in Con Dao sind unzuverlässig. Beim Auschecken dann die dritte Zahlung wegen der Minibar. Hotelgäste auf der ganzen Welt zahlen mit Kreditkarte, aber das Mystery-Hotel ahnt davon nichts, sehr ärgerlich. (Drittens) Wie kann es sein, dass es zum Frühstück keinen frischen Kaffee gibt? Wir konnten ihn uns von der Rooftop-Bar bringen lassen und mussten ihn extra bezahlen. 😩 (Viertens) Wir haben erlebt, dass Kleinkinder beim Frühstücken stehen mussten, weil es keine Kinderstühle gibt!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: きれいな部屋。スタッフの対応も丁寧。
review.comment_negative: プールは狭くて浅い。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
La camera era pulita e carina, la posizione dell'hotel era centrale
Affittano i motorini, l'isola è veramente carina da girare in moto
review.comment_negative:
Il personale non parlava bene inglese seppur cordiale, il bagno non aveva la porta della doccia e non era predisposto per non averla.
la colazione è decisamente da migliorare, non si capiva se si potesse ordinare qualcosa e se l'ordine fosse incluso oppure no, non c'era un menù e il buffet era scarso per il prezzo pagato.
La cosa che ci ha dato più fastidio è stato il rifiutarsi di farci pagare con la carta anche se era evidente che avessero il pos.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Personnel très professionnel et accueillant
Jolie vue depuis la piscine
Hôtel calme
review.comment_negative: Pas de vue sur l'extérieur depuis la chambre en dehors de la salle de bain

review.rating: Schöne, saubere Unterkunft in zentraler Lage.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Architektonisch gut durchgeplant und moder. Es war sauber und die Lage ist recht zentral. Die Warmen Speisen zum Frühstück waren jedentag ander.
review.comment_negative: Mein Zimmer 403 hatte kaum bis gar kein Internetempfang. Das Türschloss schlieste sich auch manchmal nicht. Es wurde versucht zu reparieren, aber war ab und an immer noch defekt. Die Auswahl des Frühstück ist überschaubar. Zum Strand ein wenig weit.

leider war das Frühstück eigentlich das schlechteste. es gab kein Omlett oder ähnliches. erst auf Nachfrage. hier muss der Service besser sein. 
Auch die Drinks an der Bar waren eher mittelmäßig.
